summary: Main Menu Manager (MMM) allows you to customize Skyrim's main menu, creating a theme of your choice, changing the background, music, logo and fog. The lite versions include 50 backgrounds, 25 songs and 3 additional options.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red] [size=3] Each 'MMM Lite' version at the 'Optional Files' session has 50 different backgrounds, so don't forget to download and try them all :) [/size] [/color]

[line]

[size=8] [color=white] [b] Main Menu Manager (MMM) [/b][/color][b] [/size] [/b]

[line]
by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/13322980] highmacleod [/url]


[size=5] [b]
============ [color=gold]
DESCRIPTION [/color]
============ [/b][/size]

"Main Menu Manager (MMM)" is a mod for The Elder Scrolls V - Skyrim that allows you to customize the main menu, creating a theme of your choice, changing the background, music, logo and fog.

There will be a series of Lite versions (each one including 50 backgrounds, 25 songs and 3 additional options for the game main menu) and Full versions with 200 backgrounds each. The Main version will have a total of 1000 backgrounds (I might change it in the future, but that's the main idea so far).

It has an install window (when using Nexus Mod Manager) where you can choose among different backgrounds/wallpapers and music on the list, from various artists and players. Then, you'll have some options to change the Bethesda logo, remove the fog or to skip the Bethesda intro for a faster game start up. With this mod you can create a complete new theme to give your main menu a new look and feel.

MMM is intended to integrate all related mods into one, building a big collection pack. In the future I'll add more options like a randomizer, different fonts and animated backgrounds. I'll then study a bit about the loading screens :)

(Read the "Readme.txt" for more information about the authors, song titles, install/uninstall, notes and credits)

Version 1.04


[size=5] [b]
============= [color=gold]
INSTALLATION [/color]
============= [/b][/size]

[b] [color=red] ATTENTION! [/color][/b]
---------------
[list][*] Before installing/uninstalling a mod, always open Nexus Mod Manager with administrator rights (if you use a Windows OS) to avoid errors.[*] Checking the "Skip Bethesda Video Intro" option will ask you to overwrite files, click 'Yes to all' to normally complete the mod installation.[/list]


[b][color=white]AUTO[/color][/b]
------
You can use the Nexus Mod Manager to easily activate/install this mod (recommended), or

[b][color=white]MANUAL[/color][/b]
----------
1) unpack the "MMM_Themes.7z" file in a folder of your choice
2) for the background, open the "BG" folder then select a background folder and copy both "Meshes" and "Textures" folders into your \Data folder where your game is installed.
3) for the music, open the "Music" folder then select a music of your choice and copy the "music" folder into your \Data folder where your game is installed.
4) to remove the Bethesda logo in your main menu, copy the file "startmenu.swf" located in Logo\interface into your game install folder \Data\Interface
5) to remove the fog, go into Fog\meshes\interface and copy the file "intmenufogparticles.nif" into your game install folder \Data\meshes\interface
6) to skip the Bethesda video intro, go into the \Intro\Video folder and copy the "BGS_Logo.bik" file into your game install folder \Data\Video, overwriting the file (the original file will be restored after uninstallation)


[size=5] [b]
================ [color=gold]
UNINSTALLATION [/color]
================ [/b][/size]

[b][color=white]AUTO[/color][/b]
------
You can use the Nexus Mod Manager to easily deactivate/uninstall this mod (recommended), or

[b][color=white]MANUAL[/color][/b]
----------
1) delete the "mainmenuwallpaper.dds" file from \Data\textures\interface\objects
2) delete the "logo.nif" file from \Data\meshes\interface\logo
3) delete the "mus_maintheme.xwm" file from \Data\music\special
4) to restore the Bethesda logo in your main menu, go to your game install folder \Data\Interface and delete the file "startmenu.swf" (Attention! it's STARTmenu.swf, not STATSmenu.swf)
5) to restore the fog, remove the file "intmenufogparticles.nif" from your game install folder \Data\meshes\interface
6) to restore the Bethesda video intro, remove the "BGS_Logo.bik" file located in your game install folder \Data\Video

(If for any reason NMM gives you an error and closes while uninstalling/deactivating this mod, just reopen NMM and uninstall it again then it shall work)


[size=5] [b]
============== [color=gold]
BACKGROUNDS [/color]
============== [/b][/size]

[size=5] [b]
====== [color=gold]
NOTES [/color]
====== [/b][/size]

This mod may not be compatible with other mods that'll tweak your main menu.
I'll keep releasing alternate lite versions of this mod with new upcoming images and also the classic ones depending on the free time and support.
The "Main Menu Manager (MMM) Theme" and "Black Screen" backgrounds are not included in the 50 background count.
I've made some minor changes in some wallpapers like resizing, changing levels, saturation, and used filters like sharp and oil painting, dry brush, etc. I also made a minor modification in Strader's metal cover by using some cutouts and fade in/out, but always keeping as close to the original as possible, except when applying artistic filters for a few images.
If you find any bug or see any wrong citation, etc, send me a message specifying the issue.
You may update the mod by yourself and include new themes but please do not post/upload it anywhere without my concern. Send me a message or mail with the updated version so I can post it at the Nexus website and contact me before storing the mod anywhere else besides the Nexus.
All images and songs in this mod were given permission to use by the authors.
It'll never be my intention to infringe any copyrighted material, I just like customization and art, that's all.
Please contact me if any material included in this mod, image or audio, belongs to you and you want it removed or properly cited.


[size=5] [b]
================ [color=gold]
FUTURE RELEASES [/color]
================ [/b][/size]

Future versions might include different fonts, logos or symbols, animated backgrounds, random backgrounds and music, or any other cool feature.


[size=5] [b]
================= [color=gold]
CREDITS & THANKS [/color]
================= [/b][/size]

Thanks to Bethesda for such marvelous creations, allowing us to mod and share our projects and granting me permission to use the official songs.
Thanks to the Nexus community and all those who endorse and support this mod.
Thanks to everyone above mentioned, all artists, composers, musicians, bands, everyone involved in the creation and edition of all backgrounds and music included in this mod.
Thanks PEN Music Group Inc. and ZeniMax Media Inc. for allowing the use of the official Skyrim music, and to Malukah for giving permission to use her covers and for being such a marvelous musician and person.
Thank you fellows that answered my messages and gave me permission to show your art here.
If you like an art or song here, check the authors links, like, endorse, support or comment something about their work. It won't hurt [:)]

[size=5"] [b]
=========== [color=gold]
CHANGELOG [/color]
=========== [/b][/size]

[color=white][b]Main Menu Manager (MMM) Lite 1[/b][/color]
------------------------------------------------

Version 1.01
----------------
Removed the songs from other games/movies because of copyrighted material and included more Bethesda Softworks songs by Jeremy Soule.

Version 1.02
----------------
Rearranged the backgrounds and removed other copyrighted songs (waiting for permission).

Version 1.03
----------------
Permission granted from Bethesda to use Jeremy Soule's official music, thus adding more songs to the list.

Version 1.04
----------------
Included the 'Sons of Skyrim' cover by Brandon Strader / Dovahkiin (Metal Cover).


[color=white][b]Main Menu Manager (MMM) Lite 2[/b][/color]
------------------------------------------------

Version 1.01
----------------
Permission granted from Bethesda to use Jeremy Soule's official music, thus adding more songs to the list. Also, Included the 'Sons of Skyrim' cover by Brandon Strader / Dovahkiin (Metal Cover).


[color=white][b]Main Menu Manager (MMM) Lite 5[/b][/color]
------------------------------------------------

Version 1.01
----------------
Corrected a citation.

[line]
Mod created by: Marcus Guimarães (MV)
Nexus profile: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/13322980] highmacleod [/url]
Facebook: [url=http://www.facebook.com/high.macleod] Connor Macleod [/url]
author: highmacleod

files.name: Main Menu Manager (MMM) Lite 1
files.changelogHtml:
Version 1.01
----------------
Removed the songs from other games/movies because of copyrighted material and included more Bethesda Softworks songs by Jeremy Soule.

Version 1.02
----------------
Rearranged the backgrounds and removed other copyrighted songs (waiting for permission).

Version 1.03
----------------
Permission granted from Bethesda to use Jeremy Soule's official music, thus adding more songs to the list.

Version 1.04
----------------
Included the 'Sons of Skyrim' cover by Brandon Strader / Dovahkiin (Metal Cover).
